A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 28, 2010''', at 23:04 UTC<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(18:08:05) <Notch> mc's been updated =)"</ref>, which added arrow crafting<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(18:08:25) <Notch> apple in upper left corner = arrow"</ref> and fixed bugs from previous version.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Crafting]]'''
* Pressing {{key|B}} opens the "Crafting" menu.
* Unlike with the inventory, the player can't move while crafting (just like versions newer than Java Edition Alpha v1.0.14).
* The maximum item stack size is only 1 in a box of the "Crafting" menu.
* Only available recipe being an apple (in the top left-hand corner box) or more than one apple (one of them must be in the top left-hand corner box) to an arrow.
{{crafting table
|A1=Apple
|Output=Arrow
}}

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''

'''From Indev 0.31 20100128-2200'''
* Fixed graphical glitch when game starts.
* Fixed separate item stacking.

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* It is possible to use more than one apple to craft an arrow.
* Performance has reduced significantly in some computers.
